com.tingyik90.snackprogressbar

Class SnackProgressBarManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tingyik90.snackprogressbar.SnackProgressBarManager

  • public class SnackProgressBarManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class handling all the SnackProgressBars added into queue. It adds a RelativeLayout on top of the current activity. There is only ONE instance of this layout. All actions of showing, hiding and updating the SnackProgressBar are reflected via this layout i.e. no new layout drawn.
